mapper.select: select g.*,s.sigungu_name as area, (select count(*) from insider where status=1 and ground_no=#{groundNo}) as participants from ground g, sigungu s where g.ground_no=#{groundNo} and s.sigungu_no=g.sigungu_no
select m.id,m.name,m.email from inssa_member m, insider i where i.ground_no=#{value} and i.status=0 and i.id=m.id
mapper.update: update insider set status=1 where id=#{memberVO.id} and ground_no=#{groundNo}
mapper.insert:
select ground_seq.nextval from dual
insert into ground(ground_no,max_personnel,introduction,ground_name,master,hobby_no,sigungu_no,status) values(#{groundNo},#{maxPersonnel},#{introduction},#{groundName},#{master},#{hobby},#{area},0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from hashtag where content=#{value}

select g.ground_no,g.max_personnel,g.introduction,g.ground_name,g.master,g.hobby_no as hobby,g.sigungu_no,i.img_name from ground g left join ground_img i on g.ground_no = i.ground_no where g.ground_no=#{value}
